title: Docker-Pirate

technologies: Docker, Docker-Compose, DevOps, Jenkins, NodeJs, Flask, MySQL, MongoDB, ELK, IBM, GoLang, IBM, Ubuntu, Prometheus.

title: Terraform Playground
description: Fun infrastructure solutions and PoCs to explore Terraform concepts and deployments in AWS.

title: AWS Medical Providers Automation
description: Automation that weekly downloads and updates medical records for different datasets.

title: AWS REST-API for Sales 'Leads'
description: Custom-built business REST-API on top of AWS API Gateway (with Lambdas integration) that connected to MySQL database for commercial 'leads' information.
technologies: AWS, API-Gateway, Lambda, MySQL, CDK, REST-API.

title: AWS CDK Lambda Docker Templates
description: My own CDK template (simple pattern) for deploying AWS Lambda Functions on top of Docker images. It covers Python and NodeJs images.
technologies: AWS, CDK, Lambda, Docker, Python, NodeJs.

title: Python Clean Tests Examples and Templates

technologies: Python, Tests, Unittest, PyTest, Mocks, Object-Oriented-Programming.

title: AWS Lambda Web Scrapper for Supplier Datasets

technologies: AWS, Lambda, Selenium, Docker, ECR, Python, SES, EventBridge, S3.

title: AWS REST-API for URL Shortening
description: Fun AWS CDK solution with an API Gateway and DynamoDB that is designed for URL shortening redirects.
technologies: AWS, API-Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, Python, REST-API, CDK.

title: My Own CloudFormation Example Templates

title: REST-API for Australian Climate Sensors
description: API developed on top of NodeJS+Express, and used MongoDB (Atlas) for backend. Solution with Docker containers.
technologies: MongoDB, REST-API, Auth, JWT, NodeJS, Express, Docker, Docker-Compose.

title: AWS Lambda for Downloading HR Files
description: Automation on AWS Lambda for downloading Human Resources files to S3 bucket based on rules (if already downloaded or not).
